LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: The first thing I saw was a light.

LABEL: 0x357
STRING: As I lay on my back, there was a light high in the sky right above me.

LABEL: 0x38D
STRING: The season was summer.

LABEL: 0x3A5
STRING: The location was the sea.

LABEL: 0x3C5
STRING: Was that the sun I was looking at?

LABEL: 0x3EF
STRING: The dim light shimmered.

LABEL: 0x42F
STRING: It swayed in the waves.

LABEL: 0x44D
STRING: Even if I held up my hand, the light was too distant to ward off.

LABEL: 0x48D
STRING: Its glare was unpleasant.

LABEL: 0x4BD
STRING: The light moved around, chasing me.

LABEL: 0x4EF
STRING: ――No, this wasn't right.

LABEL: 0x515
STRING: I didn't want to be given light.

LABEL: 0x549
STRING: I... wanted to grasp it!

LABEL: 0x5D0
STRING: I suddenly remembered that I was at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x60A
STRING: Alone in the depths of a cold and dark sea.

LABEL: 0x644
STRING: The only thing illuminating me was a flickering and hazy light.

LABEL: 0x682
STRING: I reached out toward the too-distant light reflected in the water.

LABEL: 0x6BA
STRING: My outstretched hand.

LABEL: 0x6D4
STRING: I grabbed hold of it.

LABEL: 0x6EC
STRING: The light in my hand was very small.

LABEL: 0x716
STRING: It was weak, flickering and wavering back and forth as if it might disappear at any moment.

LABEL: 0x758
STRING: However, its warmth, no matter how small, shone through me.

LABEL: 0x7A6
STRING: I was able to stand up once again.

LABEL: 0x7E0
STRING: No matter how faint the light may be, what I grasped would serve as a guide.

LABEL: 0x832
STRING: I might still be a long way from an answer...

LABEL: 0x860
STRING: But I couldn't give up yet.

LABEL: 0x896
STRING: Because, I was still――

LABEL: 0x91C
STRING: Softly, my body floated upward.

LABEL: 0x948
STRING: I closed my eyes while surrounded by a comfortable sensation.

LABEL: 0xA7D
STRING: I woke up.

LABEL: 0xA97
STRING: I had returned to the <SHEEP III> along with a somewhat dangerous feeling that I was still floating.

LABEL: 0xAFE
STRING: I felt like I was having a bright dream.

LABEL: 0xB2A
STRING: A dazzling light covered my vision, but...

LABEL: 0xB5E
STRING: Unlike the brightness in my dream, the room I woke up in was dim... Where was I?

LABEL: 0xBB8
STRING: I pulled the blanket off my body, feeling a chill that I hadn't felt for the past few days.

LABEL: 0xC10
STRING: The bed I was sleeping in was different from the one in the crew rooms.

LABEL: 0xC50
STRING: I see. This was the emergency room――

LABEL: 0xD0C
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0xD31
STRING: I heard a voice from overhead.

LABEL: 0xDB0
STRING: Still lying down, I tilted my head to the side and saw Touri.

LABEL: 0xE74
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?

LABEL: 0xEE3
STRING: Thank goodness!」

LABEL: 0xF02
STRING: She gave a big smile as our eyes met.

LABEL: 0xF36
STRING: The contrast between her smile and tired expression felt painful.

LABEL: 0xFAB
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei, he's awake!」

LABEL: 0xFE6
STRING: Hiragino eventually appeared at her call.

LABEL: 0x107B
STRING: His expression was, in a word, relieved... I guess.

LABEL: 0x10B7
STRING: He was looking over me cautiously.

LABEL: 0x110E
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...

LABEL: 0x117F
STRING: Are you really okay?」

LABEL: 0x11C2
STRING: I stammered, trying to answer his question.

LABEL: 0x11F4
STRING: Or rather, I couldn't speak well.

LABEL: 0x121C
STRING: My voice didn't come out.

LABEL: 0x1238
STRING: It was like not being able to do a handstand after 10 years.

LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: How did you speak again...?

LABEL: 0x12DA
STRING: ――I felt dizzy.

LABEL: 0x12F2
STRING: Like I was floating.

LABEL: 0x1310
STRING: I restrained my consciousness to my body.

LABEL: 0x144C
STRING: 「Calm down.」

LABEL: 0x14D3
STRING: 「You don't have to force yourself to talk.」

LABEL: 0x1508
STRING: 「Ah... No... I'm... fine now.」

LABEL: 0x153C
STRING: 「But... what happened?」

LABEL: 0x15EA
STRING: 「――Before that, let me tell you about your current condition.」

LABEL: 0x1629
STRING: My... condition?

LABEL: 0x1647
STRING: Hiragino sighed heavily as he explained.

LABEL: 0x1688
STRING: 「Cerebral contusion and acute subdural hematoma. Do you understand?」

LABEL: 0x16CD
STRING: 「Cerebral contusion...」

LABEL: 0x16F8
STRING: 「You've suffered brain damage, basically.」

LABEL: 0x172A
STRING: 「And, at a life-threatening level.」

LABEL: 0x1775
STRING: I couldn't help but gasp.

LABEL: 0x1793
STRING: 「Touri had told me to "come back alive."

LABEL: 0x17C7
STRING: But, had I really――

LABEL: 0x17EF
STRING: Had I really been that close to dying...?

LABEL: 0x1830
STRING: 「It was a race against time... To be honest, the moment I discovered it, I felt it was too late.」

LABEL: 0x1884
STRING: 「The silver lining is that the machines in the treatment room were connected to a separate power source.」

LABEL: 0x18D2
STRING: 「I couldn't have done it alone, either.」

LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: 「Do you remember the explosion in the steam room?」

LABEL: 0x198B
STRING: Unable to say anything, I shook my head, and Hiragino began to tell me what had happened.

LABEL: 0x1C1E
STRING: The axe I had swung down successfully destroyed the fuel pipe.

LABEL: 0x1C5E
STRING: The overflowing fuel quickly heated the steam room.

LABEL: 0x1C98
STRING: Had I not been wearing a diving suit, I would've lost consciousness just by being there and would've been steamed to death.

LABEL: 0x1CFC
STRING: Just like our plan to steam <COOS>... however.

LABEL: 0x1D38
STRING: Sudden heating like that had caused unexpected problems.

LABEL: 0x1EED
STRING: The heat from the steam room spread to the power room next to it. The hydrogen fuel inside caused an explosion, thanks to the rising temperature.

LABEL: 0x1FFD
STRING: 「A hydrogen explosion...」

LABEL: 0x2087
STRING: 「Yeah. It was completely unexpected...」

LABEL: 0x20B5
STRING: 「If only we'd realized that possibility sooner――」

LABEL: 0x20F6
STRING: He had no obligation to feel responsible.

LABEL: 0x2120
STRING: 「It's not your fault. It's mine for not realizing it at all.」

LABEL: 0x216E
STRING: Thinking about it calmly would have led me to that possibility.

LABEL: 0x21CC
STRING: But, we hadn't realized it.

LABEL: 0x21FC
STRING: Probably not even Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2218
STRING: No one had... No.

LABEL: 0x2242
STRING: I wonder...

LABEL: 0x22CA
STRING: Suddenly, suspicion welled up within me.

LABEL: 0x22F0
STRING: She knew, didn't she?

LABEL: 0x231C
STRING: That girl――

LABEL: 0x2440
STRING: 「When we heard the explosion, we immediately understood what had happened.」

LABEL: 0x2480
STRING: 「The fact that you had succeeded... and what had happened to you.」

LABEL: 0x24DD
STRING: Hiragino and the others had gone to the first floor after the explosion.

LABEL: 0x2517
STRING: I hadn't answered their transmissions nor shown myself,

LABEL: 0x2541
STRING: so it had been obvious that I wasn't safe.

LABEL: 0x2583
STRING: However, the hot steam overflowing inside the steam room prevented them from entering.

LABEL: 0x25D7
STRING: It wasn't until ten minutes after the explosion that my rescue was carried out by Hiragino,

LABEL: 0x261F
STRING: who was wearing another diving suit.

LABEL: 0x264B
STRING: I had been rescued, but I was in such a critical condition that I could have died at any moment.

LABEL: 0x2697
STRING: That was when Hiragino and Yukari performed emergency surgery on me.

LABEL: 0x26DD
STRING: 「Yukari-san did?」

LABEL: 0x276D
STRING: 「That's right. I'm glad she was there...」

LABEL: 0x27A3
STRING: 「Most of it was done by the program, though. These medical robots never cease to amaze me.」

LABEL: 0x280A
STRING: He sighed.

LABEL: 0x2826
STRING: It was like he was mulling over his own incompetence.

LABEL: 0x2870
STRING: Just like how the development of the word processor had marked the end of letterpress printing,

LABEL: 0x28A6
STRING: and how any sufficiently advanced technology was indistinguishable from magic...

LABEL: 0x28EC
STRING: ...He may have felt that he was losing a part of himself.

LABEL: 0x294C
STRING: Or, maybe that wasn't the case.

LABEL: 0x297E
STRING: The flow of time was unstoppable.

LABEL: 0x29A4
STRING: Its speed was not constant, however.

LABEL: 0x29D2
STRING: Time flowed endlessly slowly at the bottom of the dark, deep sea.

LABEL: 0x2A14
STRING: Life moved quietly in these waters,

LABEL: 0x2A4E
STRING: where neither light nor any threat could reach.

LABEL: 0x2A8C
STRING: Those that hadn't made it on the surface and were needed in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x2AD6
STRING: Those who dared to return to the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x2B0C
STRING: ――I felt like I'd caught a glimpse of the reason why Hiragino had become the <SHEEPS III's> doctor.

LABEL: 0x2BCB
STRING: 「I'll say it again.」

LABEL: 0x2BEF
STRING: 「The fact that you're alive is a miracle.」

LABEL: 0x2C76
STRING: 「Perhaps it would be more accurate to say that you're simply not dead.」

LABEL: 0x2CB6
STRING: 「Don't take offense... It was simply that bad.」

LABEL: 0x2D19
STRING: He told me a lot of things... but my feeling of discomfort was telling me he was right.

LABEL: 0x2D65
STRING: The sensation of floating as if my spirit was leaving my body was similar to being intoxicated.

LABEL: 0x2DB9
STRING: ...But, I wondered why.

LABEL: 0x2DDF
STRING: Was the reason I felt no physical pain because of the anesthetics?

LABEL: 0x2E2B
STRING: Also, I didn't know if it was because of the lack of physical pain, but――

LABEL: 0x2E69
STRING: I understood how serious my situation was and what Hiragino meant with his words.

LABEL: 0x2ED3
STRING: But, for some reason, I couldn't feel any of it having something to do with me.

LABEL: 0x2F52
STRING: 「H-Hey!」

LABEL: 0x2F71
STRING: I brushed off Hiragino's attempts to stop me and slowly got up.

LABEL: 0x2FBB
STRING: My left hand on the bed was still paralyzed.

LABEL: 0x2FEF
STRING: It felt numb, and I couldn't put much strength into it.

LABEL: 0x3093
STRING: The moment I sat up, I felt dizzy like someone was swinging me around by the head.

LABEL: 0x30EB
STRING: I took a deep breath to quell the nausea welling up inside me and opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x31C7
STRING: ...Okay, I'm good.

LABEL: 0x31E9
STRING: There's no problem.

LABEL: 0x32CE
STRING: 「...What are you thinking?」

LABEL: 0x32F7
STRING: 「I didn't hurt anything but my head, right?」

LABEL: 0x3323
STRING: 「Which means this isn't the time to rest.」

LABEL: 0x3361
STRING: 「Were they all eradicated? Or――」

LABEL: 0x3397
STRING: Hiragino held up the palm of his hand to stop me.

LABEL: 0x33E6
STRING: 「Calm down, Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x340F
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x3438
STRING: 「I know you're feeling impatient.」

LABEL: 0x3460
STRING: 「But first, you have to understand what's going on.」

LABEL: 0x34D4
STRING: 「Regarding <COOS>, there shouldn't be any problems.」

LABEL: 0x3515
STRING: "Probably," he added discreetly.

LABEL: 0x3552
STRING: 「We haven't been able to check everywhere thanks to what happened to you,

LABEL: 0x35A2
STRING: but we haven't encountered any since.」

LABEL: 0x362B
STRING: 「The operation was a success.」

LABEL: 0x3650
STRING: I let out a deep breath at those words.

LABEL: 0x367E
STRING: So deep that I staggered.

LABEL: 0x36C7
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...!」

LABEL: 0x36EC
STRING: 「I'm just... so glad...!」

LABEL: 0x3758
STRING: With this, I was able to avenge Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3782
STRING: That unreal color no longer existed here.

LABEL: 0x37C2
STRING: They were destroyed.

LABEL: 0x37DE
STRING: <COOS>, which had hurt us, tormented us, and stolen our friend, was no more.

LABEL: 0x382A
STRING: ――No one had to die anymore.

LABEL: 0x3858
STRING: All that was left was to get back to the surface.

LABEL: 0x387C
STRING: All we had to do was think about saving ourselves――

LABEL: 0x38AE
STRING: 「Where's everyone else?」

LABEL: 0x399D
STRING: 「――Ah, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x3A1C
STRING: 「Hold on, I'll go get her.」

LABEL: 0x3A65
STRING: A strange expression appeared on Hiragino's face for a moment, and he quickly exited the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x3B12
STRING: Following his back, I glanced back to see Touri.

LABEL: 0x3B54
STRING: She stood there with wet eyes, looking at me without saying a word.

LABEL: 0x3B92
STRING: If I looked closely, I could see dark circles under her eyes.

LABEL: 0x3BC6
STRING: Her bleary eyes couldn't hide her drowsiness.

LABEL: 0x3BFC
STRING: 「Did you wait for me all this time?」

LABEL: 0x3C37
STRING: 「It's the least I could do.」

LABEL: 0x3C70
STRING: 「...Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x3CED
STRING: My words of gratitude came out naturally, without any calculation or intention.

LABEL: 0x3D37
STRING: She smiled shyly.

LABEL: 0x3D5F
STRING: I felt embarrassed, too.

LABEL: 0x3D91
STRING: I tried changing the subject as my eyes darted around awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x3DC7
STRING: 「Speaking of which, where's Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x3E59
STRING: 「She's... been missing ever since.」

LABEL: 0x3E96
STRING: She told me nonchalantly, seemingly unworried.

LABEL: 0x3ECE
STRING: Ever since..? Did she mean since the explosion?

LABEL: 0x3F00
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x3F36
STRING: Despite hearing that she was missing, I was not surprised.

LABEL: 0x3F7C
STRING: Perhaps it was because I had learned how she tended to act alone without telling anyone.

LABEL: 0x3FD6
STRING: Or, maybe it was because of the relief of getting rid of <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x4080
STRING: ――But.

LABEL: 0x4098
STRING: I applied gravity to my restless thoughts.

LABEL: 0x40D0
STRING: Something was wrong.

LABEL: 0x40EE
STRING: What was this strange feeling?

LABEL: 0x4173
STRING: <COOS> had been destroyed according to Reiri's plan.

LABEL: 0x41A5
STRING: It was hard to imagine she hadn't thought beyond just eradicating them.

LABEL: 0x41FF
STRING: I wondered what Reiri was planning to do after annihilating the threat that had loomed over us.

LABEL: 0x4279
STRING: What was she doing right now?

LABEL: 0x4356
STRING: 「...Achoo!」

LABEL: 0x4379
STRING: 「Hey, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x4399
STRING: Touri's sneeze brought me back to reality.

LABEL: 0x43C3
STRING: She sniffled.

LABEL: 0x43E9
STRING: Then, she rubbed her exposed upper arm like she was cold.

LABEL: 0x441F
STRING: It was hard to tell because of my condition,

LABEL: 0x4457
STRING: but to say that it was midsummer right now felt like a lie. The room was very cold.

LABEL: 0x44F8
STRING: 「What about the heating?」

LABEL: 0x4521
STRING: 「It's broken...

LABEL: 0x45EB
STRING: Wait, you're the one who broke it!」

LABEL: 0x4629
STRING: ...That was a stupid question.

LABEL: 0x4649
STRING: Touri giggled.

LABEL: 0x4678
STRING: 「I'm fine, I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x4694
STRING: 「It's just a little cold.」

LABEL: 0x4717
STRING: 「Better than having that weird "light" thing around――」

LABEL: 0x4769
STRING: 「...Achoo!」

LABEL: 0x478C
STRING: This was the price for destroying <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x47B4
STRING: We were now in an environment without heating.

LABEL: 0x47F4
STRING: That said, the temperature was still bearable, but it was dropping gradually.

LABEL: 0x484A
STRING: If this continued, we'd not last long due to hypothermia.

LABEL: 0x487E
STRING: If we didn't get out of here immediately――

LABEL: 0x48A4
STRING: What in the world was Reiri doing at a time like this?

LABEL: 0x48DC
STRING: Where did she disappear to?

LABEL: 0x4900
STRING: Without her, this operation to exterminate <COOS> would not have been possible.

LABEL: 0x494E
STRING: Reiri's absence made me feel extremely uneasy.

LABEL: 0x499D
STRING: 「*Yawn*」

LABEL: 0x49BC
STRING: Touri let out a relaxed yawn.

LABEL: 0x49D8
STRING: It unraveled the tense air inside the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4A24
STRING: She put her hand over her mouth apologetically.

LABEL: 0x4AC2
STRING: 「Huh, now that I'm relieved, I feel drowsy for some reason.」

LABEL: 0x4B00
STRING: 「Maybe I'm getting sleepy...」

LABEL: 0x4B4D
STRING: She sat down next to me as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x4B7B
STRING: Of course she'd be tired...

LABEL: 0x4BA5
STRING: It was only natural since she had been attending to me all this time.

LABEL: 0x4BE7
STRING: And I was sure the dropping temperature had something to do with it as well...

LABEL: 0x4C21
STRING: I put my blanket over Touri's shoulders.

LABEL: 0x4C89
STRING: She was on the brink of falling asleep.

LABEL: 0x4CA3
STRING: I lent her my shoulder as I waited for Hiragino and Yukari to return.

LABEL: 0x4CE9
STRING: Although I had lent her my blanket, I didn't feel chilly at all myself.

LABEL: 0x4D31
STRING: Time sure flowed slowly in the deep sea...

LABEL: 0x50B8
STRING: I could hear the sound of thudding footsteps.

LABEL: 0x50DA
STRING: Following the sound, Yukari came rushing into the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x5178
STRING: 「Katagiri-san! Thank goodness...!」

LABEL: 0x5201
STRING: 「――Ah, sorry...」

LABEL: 0x5230
STRING: She greeted me with a cheerful smile.

LABEL: 0x5266
STRING: After noticing the sleeping Touri, she lowered her voice.

LABEL: 0x5308
STRING: 「I'm so glad you're safe.」

LABEL: 0x534B
STRING: Yukari showed her relief without holding back.

LABEL: 0x537D
STRING: Both Touri and Yukari must've been very worried about me.

LABEL: 0x53C9
STRING: My feelings of gratitude and a feeling that I should apologize melded together.

LABEL: 0x540F
STRING: 「I'm... sorry for worrying you.」

LABEL: 0x543F
STRING: 「But it worked...」

LABEL: 0x5465
STRING: 「<COOS> is no longer――」

LABEL: 0x549A
STRING: 「It's alright. You don't have to say anything more.」

LABEL: 0x54CB
STRING: Yukari-san...

LABEL: 0x54F2
STRING: 「The most important thing is that you're safe.」

LABEL: 0x552E
STRING: 「If anything happened to you... I wouldn't be able to face your sister, you know.」

LABEL: 0x5583
STRING: Her tone was playful.

LABEL: 0x55A5
STRING: However, according to what Hiragino had told me about my body,

LABEL: 0x55D9
STRING: saying that "nothing had happened" was a stretch.

LABEL: 0x563D
STRING: Seeing Yukari smile at me head-on made me feel a little embarrassed for some reason.

LABEL: 0x5681
STRING: Was it because she was always either angry or wearing a serious expression?

LABEL: 0x5733
STRING: 「What's the matter?」

LABEL: 0x575C
STRING: She looked at me, puzzled.

LABEL: 0x5796
STRING: Hiragino entered the room after her.

LABEL: 0x57BE
STRING: I didn't see Reiri with him, and Tokiwa was already...

LABEL: 0x5818
STRING: It was a little depressing to see our numbers dwindle, but I believed we were making steady progress.

LABEL: 0x5864
STRING: We would definitely escape.

LABEL: 0x5882
STRING: There was still a lot we had to do to make that happen, but...

LABEL: 0x58C6
STRING: Right now, I just wanted a moment of peace.

LABEL: 0x5C36
STRING: We had achieved victory over <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x5C5A
STRING: That must have been a major step toward our road to escape.

LABEL: 0x5C98
STRING: But, it wasn't over yet.

LABEL: 0x5CCC
STRING: We couldn't stay in this state of harmony forever.

LABEL: 0x5D0C
STRING: There was still something we needed to do.

LABEL: 0x5D9E
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, do you have any ideas on how to escape?」

LABEL: 0x5DE9
STRING: 「...The simple solution would be to tell the surface that <COOS> has been dealt with.」

LABEL: 0x5E47
STRING: 「If we do that... rescue will come this time.」

LABEL: 0x5E88
STRING: 「How do we contact them?」

LABEL: 0x5EB7
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x5ED3
STRING: 「That's what we should think about next.」

LABEL: 0x5EFB
STRING: Yukari bowed her head.

LABEL: 0x5F11
STRING: It was a deep, deep bow.

LABEL: 0x5F31
STRING: I could see a shadow on her face.

LABEL: 0x5FC3
STRING: 「That's what I thought, too... Or, more accurately, I couldn't think of anything else.」

LABEL: 0x60A6
STRING: 「However――」

LABEL: 0x60C2
STRING: 「Unfortunately, things have changed.」

LABEL: 0x60F2
STRING: 「We can't just sit around and wait for a rescue team to come.」

LABEL: 0x614F
STRING: Her declaration was decisive.

LABEL: 0x616B
STRING: It was like she was preventing me from retorting or even expressing my doubts.

LABEL: 0x6280
STRING: 「Is this about the heating problem?」

LABEL: 0x62B4
STRING: 「Shouldn't we be all right for a while if we gather blankets from the crew rooms and wrap ourselves in them?」

LABEL: 0x631B
STRING: Hiragino sounded dubious.

LABEL: 0x63A9
STRING: 「I don't want to worry you too much, but...」

LABEL: 0x63F1
STRING: 「Please calm down and listen.」

LABEL: 0x641B
STRING: 「It seems neither of you... have much time.」

LABEL: 0x6462
STRING: 「...What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0x649C
STRING: 「What are you not telling us?」

LABEL: 0x6520
STRING: Hiragino pressed Yukari.

LABEL: 0x654D
STRING: 「...I was looking into it.」

LABEL: 0x6577
STRING: 「Is there any room left for <COOS> to exist inside the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x65BA
STRING: 「As Katagiri-san said earlier, if we want to call for rescue from the ground,

LABEL: 0x6602
STRING: we need to prove that <COOS> has been eradicated.」

LABEL: 0x6649
STRING: Her tone of voice... Was it just my imagination?

LABEL: 0x6677
STRING: She was trembling uncharacteristically.

LABEL: 0x66AC
STRING: 「I had to find out in order for us to be saved.」

LABEL: 0x66FA
STRING: 「There are only a few places you can get such information, so...」

LABEL: 0x6793
STRING: 「That's right. I examined the black box.」

LABEL: 0x67EB
STRING: 「Examined the black box――?」

LABEL: 0x6858
STRING: A black box was a device that was loaded onto an aircraft.

LABEL: 0x6898
STRING: It was designed to reveal the cause of an air accident that resulted in the total loss of crew and passengers,

LABEL: 0x68F2
STRING: and to record all information that occurred on board the aircraft without anyone's knowledge.

LABEL: 0x6950
STRING: A sort of top secret in the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x6985
STRING: The data inside was strictly controlled so that no one could lay a finger on it――

LABEL: 0x69C7
STRING: 「You say you examined it, but how exactly did you do that...?」

LABEL: 0x69FD
STRING: 「Even you shouldn't be able to access it easily, right?」

LABEL: 0x6ABB
STRING: 「I used <Onyx>.」

LABEL: 0x6AEA
STRING: 「<Onyx>?」

LABEL: 0x6B0A
STRING: I parroted the word I had never heard before.

LABEL: 0x6B38
STRING: I turned in the direction of Yukari's voice.

LABEL: 0x6BCE
STRING: 「...Since you hacked into the <SHEEP III>

LABEL: 0x6C13
STRING: I thought you'd know, but...」

LABEL: 0x6C4D
STRING: 「<Onyx>... That's the name of the VDR loaded onto the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x6C9E
STRING: Voyage Data Recorder―was it like the black box of an aircraft?

LABEL: 0x6CFB
STRING: 「To be precise, it's a device that replicates and stores the information contained in the VDR.」

LABEL: 0x6D46
STRING: 「What happened inside the <SHEEP III>, information from all the cameras and videos on the ship, sensory information,

LABEL: 0x6DAD
STRING: the environment surrounding the ship, water temperature, water pressure, water currents... It contains all sorts of information.」

LABEL: 0x6E10
STRING: 「It's a one-way device that can extract all of that information from the black box.」

LABEL: 0x6E83
STRING: A device that could extract recorded information――

LABEL: 0x6EBF
STRING: 「You couldn't access the black box itself, but you were able to copy the data...」

LABEL: 0x6F20
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x6F40
STRING: 「I was replaying the images extracted by the <Onyx> while you were unconscious... with this.」

LABEL: 0x6FB1
STRING: Yukari held up... a pair of silver glasses.

LABEL: 0x6FDF
STRING: 「What are those?」

LABEL: 0x700E
STRING: 「I found these inside the warehouse in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x7041
STRING: Were they related to Reiri, then?

LABEL: 0x70E4
STRING: At the moment of the accident on the first day...

LABEL: 0x710A
STRING: For some reason, Reiri had not been in her room, nor on the observation deck where everyone was gathered,

LABEL: 0x71C7
STRING: but alone in the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x71FB
STRING: What was she wearing at the time?

LABEL: 0x722B
STRING: No, that was strange. She was wearing normal glasses. Then, what were those...?

LABEL: 0x7328
STRING: 「Can I have them for a second?」

LABEL: 0x735B
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x7376
STRING: They looked like a perfectly normal pair of silver-framed glasses.

LABEL: 0x73CA
STRING: But, when I pressed a switch on the edge of the frame, an AR vision came up.

LABEL: 0x7482
STRING: 「These are high-performance smart glasses.」

LABEL: 0x750D
STRING: 「Normally, they should've been confiscated when boarding, but...」

LABEL: 0x7555
STRING: 「Anyway, I focused on the point of "contact" between the open sea and the inside of this ship.」

LABEL: 0x75B1
STRING: 「The point of contact between the open sea and this ship...」

LABEL: 0x75E7
STRING: 「I figured that was where <COOS> had entered the ship from.」

LABEL: 0x7694
STRING: 「I also saw what you all did while I was gone.」

LABEL: 0x7701
STRING: While Yukari was gone...

LABEL: 0x771D
STRING: Back when Yukari had been sleeping due to exhaustion.

LABEL: 0x7761
STRING: But, did something significant happen in that timeframe?

LABEL: 0x77A5
STRING: Something that allowed <COOS> to break in or――

LABEL: 0x78A8
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x78C2
STRING: 「You were butchering the fish you had caught, weren't you?」

LABEL: 0x7904
STRING: 「...With your bare hands.」

LABEL: 0x798C
STRING: 「Y-Yeah... But, do you mean to say that's how <COOS> entered the ship?」

LABEL: 0x79E4
STRING: 「In that case, shouldn't I have been infected with <COOS> a long time ago?」

LABEL: 0x7A35
STRING: Hiragino responded firmly despite being called out abruptly.

LABEL: 0x7A7D
STRING: For sure, there had been times when he'd gone pale and looked unwell.

LABEL: 0x7AC5
STRING: But whether there were signs that he was infected with <COOS>...

LABEL: 0x7AFD
STRING: ――At the very least, I didn't think there were any.

LABEL: 0x7B6F
STRING: Yukari, however――

LABEL: 0x7BF9
STRING: 「No... It wasn't <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x7C27
STRING: 「I... We were mistaken...!」

LABEL: 0x7C70
STRING: She spoke as if blaming herself, shouting in a trembling voice.

LABEL: 0x7CAE
STRING: Neither I nor Hiragino could say anything.

LABEL: 0x7D46
STRING: 「...That finger inside the fish...」

LABEL: 0x7D74
STRING: 「...It was hers, wasn't it...?」

LABEL: 0x7DB3
STRING: Her...?

LABEL: 0x7DCD
STRING: Yukari ruminated in a low voice.

LABEL: 0x7E5B
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei touched that blood.」

LABEL: 0x7F15
STRING: 「He... It's possible he's infected with <Alice>.」
